name: Invoke-Obfuscation COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via COMPRESS OBFUSCATION
query: (winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:/[Ss][Ee][Rr][Vv][Ii][Cc][Ee]\ [Cc][Oo][Nn][Tt][Rr][Oo][Ll]\ [Mm][Aa][Nn][Aa][Gg][Ee][Rr]/ AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Nn][Ee][Ww]\-[Oo][Bb][Jj][Ee][Cc][Tt].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Tt][Ee][Xx][Tt]\.[Ee][Nn][Cc][Oo][Dd][Ii][Nn][Gg]\]\:\:[Aa][Ss][Cc][Ii][Ii].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:/.*[Rr][Ee][Aa][Dd][Tt][Oo][Ee][Nn][Dd].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(/.*\:[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Ii][Oo]\.[Cc][Oo][Mm][Pp][Rr][Ee][Ss][Ss][Ii][Oo][Nn]\.[Dd][Ee][Ff][Ll][Aa][Tt][Ee][Ss][Tt][Rr][Ee][Aa][Mm].*/ OR /.*[Ss][Yy][Ss][Tt][Ee][Mm]\.[Ii][Oo]\.[Ss][Tt][Rr][Ee][Aa][Mm][Rr][Ee][Aa][Dd][Ee][Rr].*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:System AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager AND event.code:7045 AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*new\-object* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*text.encoding\]\:\:ascii* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*readtoend* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:(*\:system.io.compression.deflatestream* OR *system.io.streamreader*))`
